text: aur jin logon ko khuda ne apane fazal (va karam) se kuchh diya hai (aur phir) bukhl karate hain vah haragiz is khyaal mein na rahen ki ye unake lie (kuchh) behatar hoga balki ye unake haq mein badatar hai kyonki jis (maal) ka bukhl karate hain anaqareeb hee qayaamat ke din usaka tauq banaakar unake gale mein pahanaaya jaega aur saare aasamaan va zameen kee meeraas khuda hee kee hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khabaradaar hai
